author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Backport of #37858
This PR adds the dump of the beamspot parameters that are the uploaded in DIP.

#### PR validation:
Code compiles and run `Online_BeamMonitor_file.py` in the test directory to check that the printed information is correct.

#### Backport:
Backport of #37858

FYI @gennai @dzuolo @sikler
title: [12_3_X] Dump of the beamspot for DIP
